_meanings:
The cheek; especially, the
part of the cheek near the corners
of the mouth. (Rhetoricians 
consider this word to be {#grAmya#} or 
vulgar; <ab>cf.</ab> the instance given in  
<ls>K. P. 7</ls>: --{#tAMbUlaBftagalloyaM BallaM jalpati mAnuzaH#};
but <ab>cf.</ab> Bhavabhūti's use:  
--{#pAtAlapratimallagallavivaraprakziptasaptArRavaM#}  
<ls>Māl. 5. 22</ls>).

a small round
pillow to put underneath the cheek.
